mapper.insert: insert into bd_position_responsibility( GRADE_CODE, responsibility, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER ) values ( #{GRADE_CODE}, #{responsibility}, #{CREATE_TIME}, #{CREATE_USER}, #{UPDATE_TIME}, #{UPDATE_USER} )
mapper.select: select a.GRADE_CODE from bd_position_level a WHERE a.ID = #{id}
mapper.update: update bd_position_responsibility set responsibility = #{responsibility}, UPDATE_TIME = #{UPDATE_TIME}, UPDATE_USER = #{UPDATE_USER} where ID = #{ID}
mapper.select: select a.* from bd_position_responsibility a left join bd_position_level b on a.GRADE_CODE = b.GRADE_CODE WHERE b.ID = #{id} and a.ISDEL = 0
select d.GRADE_CODE from sys_user b,bd_employee c,bd_position_level d WHERE b.USERNAME = #{USER} AND b.NUMBER = c.EMP_CODE AND c.EMP_GRADE_ID = d.ID
mapper.insert: insert into bd_responsibility_detail( responsibility_id, detail, requirement, unit, standard_time, frequency, guide, target, needApprove, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER ) values ( #{responsibility_id}, #{detail}, #{requirement}, #{unit}, #{standard_time}, #{frequency}, #{guide}, #{target}, #{needApprove}, #{CREATE_TIME}, #{CREATE_USER}, #{UPDATE_TIME}, #{UPDATE_USER} )
mapper.update: update bd_responsibility_detail set detail = #{detail}, requirement = #{requirement}, unit =#{unit}, standard_time = #{standard_time}, frequency = #{frequency}, guide = #{guide}, target = #{target}, needApprove = #{needApprove}, UPDATE_TIME = #{UPDATE_TIME}, UPDATE_USER = #{UPDATE_USER} where ID = #{ID}
mapper.select: select * from bd_responsibility_detail where responsibility_id = #{ID} and ISDEL = 0

SELECT rd.ID, rd.responsibility_id, rd.detail, ucd.detail_id FROM bd_responsibility_detail rd LEFT JOIN bd_position_responsibility pr on (rd.responsibility_id = pr.ID and pr.ISDEL=0) LEFT JOIN bd_position_level pl on pr.GRADE_CODE = pl.GRADE_CODE LEFT JOIN bd_employee e on pl.ID = e.EMP_GRADE_ID LEFT JOIN bd_user_common_duty ucd on rd.ID = ucd.detail_id AND ucd.emp_code = e.EMP_CODE WHERE e.EMP_CODE = #{NUMBER} and ucd.detail_id IS NULL and rd.ISDEL = 0

SELECT rd.ID, rd.responsibility_id, rd.detail, ucd.detail_id FROM bd_responsibility_detail rd LEFT JOIN bd_position_responsibility pr on rd.responsibility_id = pr.ID LEFT JOIN bd_position_level pl on pr.GRADE_CODE = pl.GRADE_CODE LEFT JOIN bd_employee e on pl.ID = e.EMP_GRADE_ID LEFT JOIN bd_user_common_duty ucd on rd.ID = ucd.detail_id AND ucd.emp_code = e.EMP_CODE WHERE e.EMP_CODE = #{NUMBER} and ucd.detail_id IS NOT NULL and rd.ISDEL = 0;
select count(*) from bd_user_common_duty where emp_code = #{user} and detail_id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from bd_user_common_duty where emp_code = #{user} and detail_id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from bd_position_responsibility WHERE GRADE_CODE = #{GRADE_CODE} AND responsibility =#{responsibility} AND ISDEL = 0
select * from bd_responsibility_detail WHERE responsibility_id = #{responsibility_id} AND detail =#{detail} AND ISDEL = 0

select detail.ID, detail.responsibility_id, detail.detail, detail.requirement, resp.responsibility,resp.GRADE_CODE,emp.EMP_CODE from bd_responsibility_detail detail left join bd_position_responsibility resp on resp.ID=detail.responsibility_id left join bd_position_level pos on pos.GRADE_CODE=resp.GRADE_CODE left join bd_employee emp on emp.EMP_GRADE_ID=pos.ID where emp.EMP_CODE=#{empCode} AND resp.ISDEL = 0 AND detail.ISDEL = 0
mapper.insert: insert into bd_responsibility_detail(responsibility_id, detail, requirement, unit, standard_time, frequency, guide, target, needApprove, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER, ISDEL) select (select ID from bd_position_responsibility where GRADE_CODE = ( select GRADE_CODE from bd_position_level where grade_name=#{targetName}), detail, requirement, unit, standard_time, frequency, guide, target, needApprove, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER, ISDEL from bd_responsibility_detail where ISDEL=0 and responsibility_id=( select ID from bd_position_responsibility where GRADE_CODE = ( select GRADE_CODE from bd_position_level where grade_name=#{sourceName}))
mapper.select: select d.DEPT_SIGN,d.DEPT_NAME, pos.GRADE_CODE, pos.GRADE_NAME, pos.JOB_RANK, r.responsibility from bd_position_responsibility r left join (select GRADE_CODE, GRADE_NAME, JOB_RANK, ATTACH_DEPT_ID from bd_position_level where ATTACH_DEPT_ID = #{deptId} and ISDEL = 0 ) pos on pos.GRADE_CODE = r.GRADE_CODE left join bd_department d on d.ID = pos.ATTACH_DEPT_ID where r.ISDEL = 0 and pos.GRADE_CODE is not null order by r.GRADE_CODE

select res.GRADE_CODE, res.responsibility, d.detail, d.requirement, d.frequency, d.guide, d.standard_time, d.target from bd_responsibility_detail d left join ( select pos.GRADE_CODE, pos.GRADE_NAME, pos.JOB_RANK, r.responsibility, r.ID from bd_position_responsibility r left join (select GRADE_CODE, GRADE_NAME, JOB_RANK, ATTACH_DEPT_ID from bd_position_level where ATTACH_DEPT_ID = #{deptId} and ISDEL = 0 ) pos on pos.GRADE_CODE = r.GRADE_CODE where r.ISDEL = 0 and pos.GRADE_CODE is not null order by r.GRADE_CODE ) res on res.ID = d.responsibility_id where d.ISDEL = 0 and res.ID is not null
